professional_summary: Experienced Oracle DBA with expertise in database administration, performance tuning, backup/recovery strategies, and disaster recovery planning. Proficient in RMAN, Flashback technology, and ASM migrations.

key_responsibilities: Provided high-level support for Oracle databases
utilizing RMAN for regular backups and disaster recovery drills.
Collaborated with application teams to resolve database issues and improve system performance.
successfully migrating multiple databases from non-ASM to ASM configurations.
